Docs.summary: Provides access to the return value or results of executing a query.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetParameterValue(int32 parameterIndex) cil managed

Docs.param: The index of the parameter to be retrieved.
Docs.summary: Provides access to the *n*th output parameter.
Docs.returns: An object that contains the value of the specified parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is typically used when the query is a mapped function that has output parameters.

Docs.summary: Gets the return value or result of the executed query.
Docs.value: The value or result of the executed query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This object has the same underlying type as the `Type` property of the query expression.
